name: Circle Break - glow neon smash
description:
Circle Break is a taptap game that stimulates the heart.
Tap on your phone screen to smash the circles!
Be careful to avoid gray circles! Touching it will cause you to fail!
Break through numerous layers of obstacles and finally hit the center!


Your goal is to detonate the core!

Game features:

- Modern UI with the best effects.

- 2 modes: Normal and Difficult.

- 4 different ways to play - Choose yours.

Gradually increase difficulty and test your reflex!
